name: Radiant MLHub
description: An open-access repository for Earth observation training data and machine learning models, storing datasets via a STAC-compliant catalog and exposing access through a common API.

data_themes.description: Earth observation, environmental geospatial, satellite imagery, machine learning labeled data.
Machine learning models, training datasets, labeled imagery.

geotopics.description: Satellite imagery, land cover, and base maps.
Environmental geospatial and Earth observation data.
